Transamerica | Senior Java Developer | Denver, CO | Full-time | ONSITE | Competitive Salary + Bonus, 401k + Pension, Healthcare.

Transamerica is a part of AEGON, an international life insurance, pension, and asset management company. We are building B2B and B2C applications to support our lines of business.

I have 5 open positions for Senior Java Devs in our downtown Denver office. We are building microservices using Java, Spring Boot, and Camel. We are deploying to OpenShift on-prem or to AWS. Familiarity with AWS (ECS, Kineses, DynamoDB, S3), build tools (Maven, Jenkins, Git), API gateways is a plus.

You can read full job posting and apply here: https://goo.gl/6HuU4U
